channel.title: CVE Feed for Vertiv -- Avocent UMG-4000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vertiv -- Avocent UMG-4000

item.title: CVE-2019-9508|2024-09-17T01:41:38.736Z -- vertiv -- avocent%20umg-4000
item.description: The web interface of the Vertiv Avocent UMG-4000 version 4.2.1.19 is vulnerable to stored XSS. A remote attacker authenticated with an administrator account could store a maliciously named file within the web application that would execute each time a user browsed to the page.

item.title: CVE-2019-9507|2024-09-17T02:56:53.082Z -- vertiv -- avocent%20umg-4000
item.description: The web interface of the Vertiv Avocent UMG-4000 version 4.2.1.19 is vulnerable to command injection because the application incorrectly neutralizes code syntax before executing. Since all commands within the web application are executed as root, this could allow a remote attacker authenticated with an administrator account to execute arbitrary commands as root.
